ai-tha-ap340:1.4_0: a master of the three Vedas:
ai-tha-ap340:2.1_0: you’re honored in front of me.
ai-tha-ap340:2.3_0: for the benefit of the waters of the Vedas:
ai-tha-ap340:3.4_0: practice the absorption to the ocean.
ai-tha-ap340:4.2_0: like a moving in the imperturbable.
ai-tha-ap340:5.1_0: Having raised my joined palms to him:
ai-tha-ap340:6.2_0: I threw a drip of kett.
ai-tha-ap340:7.1_0: wandering for alms in the forest,
ai-tha-ap340:7.2_0: a great group of monks, etc.
ai-tha-ap340:7.3_0: if he stood making the ground for six.
ai-tha-ap340:7.4_0: I was struck with a sense of urgency,
ai-tha-ap340:8.1_0: if he has gone out from the house;
ai-tha-ap340:8.3_0: The Teacher was standing in the vicinity of the State,
ai-tha-ap340:8.4_0: granting me about the perfected ones.
ai-tha-ap340:9.3_0: I shall extol the darkness with you,
ai-tha-ap340:10.2_0: will delight in the world of the gods.
ai-tha-ap340:11.1_0: dwelling in the world of the gods.
ai-tha-ap340:11.4_0: incapable of being difficult to support.
ai-tha-ap340:12.2_0: wheel-turning monarch will be successful in the Universal Monarch.
ai-tha-ap340:13.4_0: he’ll be reborn on what he could be reborn.
ai-tha-ap340:14.4_0: you’re stingy, you’re not a disease,
ai-tha-ap340:15.2_0: you’re stingy, you’re not a disease,
ai-tha-ap340:15.3_0: When one person has come to a mission,
ai-tha-ap340:16.2_0: you’ve been accused like a tortoise:
ai-tha-ap340:17.3_0: Having given it to one day, she gave it to the level,
ai-tha-ap340:18.1_0: you’re stricken by the root of a tree,
ai-tha-ap340:18.2_0: As they’re staying in a house,
ai-tha-ap340:19.3_0: when they receive food and drink,
ai-tha-ap340:19.4_0: as well as the north is the shell.
ai-tha-ap340:20.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap340:20.4_0: as the cloth is the fruit.
ai-tha-ap340:22.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Uttara.
